name: Task Manager Web App
description: A fully functional web app to store the task and get reminded about tasks using the different techniques of JavaScript and NodeJS where anyone can create an account.

name: Weather Forecast App
description: A fully functional web application that enables users to check the weather of different places just from their mobile

name: Contest Schedule
description: A fully functional web app where anyone can check the schedule of the upcoming contest on the different platforms in one place with the multiple functionalities such as in24hr option, running option that filters contest according to the name dark-mode

name: flyCom Byte
description: A pseudo web app for search flight between two station on the basis of time n cost.

name: Library Management System
description: An app to maintain the different things at library like books, penalty, and all the diff things.
